bronze:SpreadShot.NAME: Spread Shot
bronze:SpreadShot.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

bronze:FullForce.NAME: Full Force
bronze:FullForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire ALL bronze:Blasters.

bronze:CascadeBlast.NAME: Cascade Blast
bronze:CascadeBlast.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Core.
bronze:CascadeBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Cores.

bronze:ShockCore.NAME: Shock Core
bronze:ShockCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E].

bronze:MachineFire.NAME: Machine Fire
bronze:MachineFire.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. Repeat its effects X times.

bronze:SeerCore.NAME: Seer Core
bronze:SeerCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Scry !M!. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card.

bronze:BoomerangBolt.NAME: Boomerang Bolt
bronze:BoomerangBolt.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1.
